message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $12,000 to us and I believe it would be just as valuable to you. Let's make this a win-win situation. I propose we start at $10,000 for the product.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of your product, $10,000 is a bit steep for me at this time. I'm willing to pay $8,000. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of our product. I am willing to meet you halfway. My counteroffer is $9,000 for the product.
